price: 100. Allí exhalarán fuertes quejidos y no podrán oír nada (debido al terrible castigo que sufrirán).
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
